content:
World Care Mission: Environment,
Social Responsibility, and Good Governance (ESG)

Making a positive impact on the environment, social responsibility, and good governance (ESG) is not just a topic for discussion but an underlying consideration in all that we touch.

Zoul's mission is committed to making this happen here and now. We start by creating audio content that enhances awareness and fosters the implementation of sustainability, equality, and goodness, impacting the behaviors of millions of listeners worldwide.

In creating Zoul, we involve people of all nationalities, races, religions, and genders, thereby promoting equality of opportunity for all to be part of making this world a better place.

While data quality, reliability, and greenwashing can pose challenges to the accurate measurement of ESG criteria, Zoul believes that ESG can be achieved through the world population’s strong mental health and wellness. Mental strength and wellness lead to non-discrimination and consideration of the human race as a whole. Every piece of Zoul content is built on the principle of gratitude, recognizing that everything we consume is derived from the earth and other human beings.

This profound gratitude can be cultivated through mindfulness, even in simple acts like drinking clean water and being thankful, recognizing how interconnected we all are.

Seeing oneself as part of the whole, and the whole as part of oneself. Recognizing the sufferings of others as our own and the happiness of others as our family’s happiness.

That is how and where true ESG begins.

Note: In practicing what we believe, Zoul stands behind the initiation of the global event of World Depression Care Day (WCD), making giving love, support, and care to others, bringing the world together, creating self-generating joy and sustainable long-lasting wellness for all our Zoul DNA.

Zoul is a powerful: Zoul is a powerful, high-performance, real-life-experience meditation, sleep, and healing audio app that blends ancient wisdom with modern brain science, backed by decades of proven results.
The unscripted live: The unscripted live teaching audios are created by lifelong dedicated meditators and highly successful business leaders— not by generic scriptwriters.
Created by lifelong: Created by lifelong meditation-experienced business leaders, Zoul uniquely offers
No need to clear your: No need to clear your mind meditation: Wisdom and peace are derived from observing reality, not manipulating it.
Authenticity: Authenticity: Live, unscripted audio from successful business owners and dedicated meditators—not from generic scriptwriters.
Awakening meditation: Awakening meditation: Meditate through life—anytime, anywhere, in any activity.
We, the team behind Zoul: We, the team behind Zoul, are a group of dedicated meditators and business owners. For decades, Zoul has empowered us to start, grow, and successfully exit our investments while continually reinventing new businesses.
Passing on Zoul’s wisdom: To us, Zoul is more than an app. Passing on Zoul’s wisdom, which has supported us for decades, is not just work—it’s a calling. We don’t know how others see their creations, but for us, this is our life mission.
We crafted Zoul word: We crafted Zoul word by word, pixel by pixel. Our technical team is growing and may not be perfect yet, but every word and every picture has been carefully chosen—like selecting ingredients to cook for our most beloved person—you, our cherished friends. Hundreds of thousands of secret teachings, long preserved by scholars in monasteries, have been filtered and curated for you. These teachings have helped millions overcome obstacles and thrive. Browse and choose your favorite audio, and you may find, as we have, that through repeated listening to just one session, the unwanted baggage you’ve carried can be put down.
Be liberated: Be liberated. Be happy. Be free.
Zoul is more than an app: To us, Zoul is more than an app—it’s our lifesaver, giving us mental clarity, deeper rest, and emotional resilience.
Passing on the wisdom: Passing on the wisdom that has supported us through both joyful and challenging times, helping us rise to our full potential, is our life mission. We don’t know how others see their creation, but for us, this is not just work—it’s a calling.
hear your life story: We can’t wait to meet you, virtually or in person, and hear your life story.
Awakening activity: Awakening: anytime, anywhere, in any activity.
Authentic Content: Authentic Content created by successful entrepreneurs not by scriptwriters.
Thinkers' Favorite: Thinkers’ Favorite: Think then observe. True wisdom and peace comes from reality not by manipulation.
Ancient Wisdom Meets Brain Science: Ancient Wisdom Meets Brain Science: Universal truths for all backgrounds and beliefs.
Affordability Super: Affordability: Super premium content offered at an unbeatable value.
Life Companion: Life Companion: Supports every moment of your life.
Discovering Zoul: Discovering Zoul has been a game-changer for me, helping me maintain a positive vibe and elevate my frequency to a higher level. This has been especially crucial as I prepare to launch a new business in a few months.
Amela Kalari: Amela Kalari - Founder of Melloworld ltd., UK
Zoul offers authentic: “Zoul offers authentic insights from successful leaders who are lifelong meditators. Zoul Meditate rejuvenates with guided meditation, sleep aids, and healing, providing a space to recharge and restore balance. For those dedicated to their work, it's a sanctuary to pause, breathe, and refresh. Embrace this journey; we all need space to simply be.”
Medhat Nehad Seada: Medhat Nehad Seada Founder / Visionary Designer Archiform London design studio
soul-awakening app: “Zoul is an amazing soul- awakening app that unites spiritual masters worldwide, transcending languages and religions to make meditation accessible to everyone. Enjoy teachings from our Chinese and Thai spiritual masters. I'm excited to be part of this. Every subscription supports charitable purposes, making our universe better for humanity and its legacy!”
I was an alcoholic: “At 36, I was an alcoholic, nearly divorced, and had lost my job. Zoul helped me rebuild my marriage and business. Happy wife, happy life.”
deep agony, watching: “I was in deep agony, watching the pain my infidelity had caused my wife. My betrayal shattered her self-esteem and mine. We lost our family. Then Zoul helped—first my wife, then me. The teachings are simple yet powerful, healing my past with love, bringing me fully present in my life, and helping our family set meaningful goals. Now, we’re a happy family once again.”
Zoul transformed my life: “Zoul transformed my life from a frustrated mom into one filled with happiness, a loving husband, thriving business, and wonderful children. I’ve been listening to Zoul everyday for 9 years. A must-try for mom.”
Dr Catherine: Dr Catherine., MD, Anti-Aging and Regenerative Medicine Specialist
old meditation app—too repetitive: “I was bored with my old meditation app—too repetitive, gimmicky, overly structured,  full of cliche with  no insight. Zoul is a refreshing change. The live Asian voice teachings pierced through my heart. First Felt like it was breaking me, Like Phoenix burning the pain and itself and reborn.”
had a deep peaceful: “I left it on all night, had a deep peaceful sleep and woke up really fresh. I was surprised when all the good words keep coming back to me supporting my work.”
Fahad I: Fahad I., Private Equity Fund, Saudi
Zoul washed away: “My first one hour with Zoul washed away my past trauma leaving me feel at peace and rejuvenated. In meditation, when I connected to my body and soul, I feel connected to God.”
For meditation: For meditation, focus-enhancing music, and progress tracking.

There is always support out there: There is always support out there. Let us hold faith in knowing that we can overcome anything.
I hope this message finds you well: I hope this message finds you well, at peace, and surrounded by loved ones. I know that it has been a year of challenge for many.
I was diagnosed with skin cancer and bre: I was diagnosed with skin cancer and breast cancer. I'm a positive person, but two cancer diagnoses in the space of a few months is a lot for anyone to deal with. I had a mastectomy.
​I am not out of the woods: ​I am not out of the woods and have been told by my specialists not to use the phrase 'cancer-free'.  I'll have to have checks for the rest of my life.
Im not ashamed: I’m not ashamed to say that it’s been tough.
But Im finding my way: But I’m finding my way.  I hope you are also finding your way, with love and support.
we are overwhelmed by loneliness or slee: we are overwhelmed by loneliness or sleeplessness. We all face challenges in life.
We struggle with our thoughts: We struggle with our thoughts, relationships, health, or careers.
I relate to all of these at times: I relate to all of these at times. I know many of you will, too.
And yet I feel so lucky: And yet, I feel so lucky. My charity work and writing career takes me across the UK and the entire world.
I try to use whatever platform: I try to use whatever platform I have to advocate for those who have less than they need. Supporting others brings me joy. As my grandmother told me,
​When you feel bad about yourself: “​When you feel bad about yourself, go out and give to others.”
Ive also decided to seek: I’ve also decided to seek out tools that can help with healthfulness, wellness, and peacefulness.
the meditation, sleep and wellness app: the meditation, sleep and wellness app.

I am not great at asking for help: I am not great at asking for help.  I think it’s my Scottish genes
But Zoul is cool: But Zoul is cool, and I think that most of us can use some extra support.

a meditation, sleep and wellness app: a meditation, sleep and wellness app is available.

or what you are facing, know this: or what you are facing, know this: there is always support out there.

There will be challenges, and moments of: There will be challenges, and moments of struggle, for all of us.
And we will carry on: And we will carry on, one foot forward, carrying each other and caring for each other.
I hope to see you on my travels: I hope to see you on my travels, and I will be sharing with you some of my own personal journey through
Heres to wellness, caring for ourselves: Here’s to wellness, caring for ourselves, and coming together as one!
I was thrilled: I was thrilled to lend my voice to Zoul and help share this wisdom. Listening to Zoul’s audio, I know people will overcome their past and confidently step into their future.
